meanings.sent1: She always outdreams her friends with her vivid imagination.
meanings.sent2: He outdreams everyone in the class with his creative bedtime stories.
meanings.sent3: Her ability to outdream others makes her the star of every sleepover.
meanings.sent4: His mind outdreams reality, creating a world of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's imagination outdreams the boundaries of the universe.

meanings.definition: To have more dreams or better dreams than someone else.
meanings.sent1: The artist's mind outdreams the critics, envisioning new masterpieces.
meanings.sent2: She outdreams her siblings, always waking up with exciting stories to tell.
meanings.sent3: His cat seems to outdream him, chasing imaginary mice in its sleep.
meanings.sent4: The author's pen outdreams reality, crafting worlds beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's theories outdream the limitations of current knowledge.
